attributes.action: Do not make the Covid-19 Jab mandatory for NHS and HSC staff
attributes.additional_details: Informed consent needs to be adhered to; do not infringe on the Human Rights and Free Will of NHS workers. Do not put people in the position that they must choose between their Human Rights and their employment of service to the public.
attributes.background: The Human Rights Act ensures that we have right to make choices about our lives, as well as the right to be free from discrimination for any reason. It is therefore important for staff in public bodies to not feel pressured to choose between their jobs and receiving the Covid-19 vaccine.
